comments.html:
I wonder if the multi-hop BFD is on your radar. I just wanted to simulated a network with this feature enabled.

Sadly I was not able to enable it manually on the Arista cEOS now and waiting for the Arista support comments on this issue.
comments.name: BOGDAN GOLAB

comments.html: Thank you again for the great work! I'm looking at building the labs at 6connect using netlab. I'm sure you know my colleague Jan, and he's the VP of Labs ;)
comments.name: Sander Steffann
